name: blog_blogmark
schema:
CREATE TABLE "blog_blogmark" (
   [id] INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
   [slug] TEXT,
   [link_url] TEXT,
   [link_title] TEXT,
   [via_url] TEXT,
   [via_title] TEXT,
   [commentary] TEXT,
   [created] TEXT,
   [metadata] TEXT,
   [import_ref] TEXT,
   [card_image] TEXT,
   [series_id] TEXT REFERENCES [blog_series]([id]),
   [use_markdown] INTEGER,
   [is_draft] INTEGER,
   [title] TEXT
)
